justification: Notes B’s preference for dual-threat QBs but ignores B already has a Tier 1 QB. Overlooks that A would have no healthy QB post-trade and requests an injured TE despite A’s injury aversion, mislabeling it as a ‘consistent’ TE. Value and roster fit are shaky, and reasoning lacks detail on tiers, playoff schedule, and each team’s true needs. Brief and generic.
